PRELIMINARY WORK
- 10 July 2008 -

XML Support Added
Next step was to add XML support for my slideshow. The task was not difficult but made my item far more flexible. XML FLIPPING TILES SLIDESHOW V2 was presented to the clients. I wanted to put more control into it. So I added next and previous buttons and an url button associated to every slide. At this time I decided that I want to go further and do the template where every page of it shows with this effect.
